name: HERE COMES THE HERO
description:
"Probably the same reason I'm out here: it's quiet and pretty."

Wrestling is a painful industry, and sometimes respite is hard to find. 

Getting a once in a lifetime chance to talk to your hero is even harder. Young, newly signed wrestler Dexter Flex (you) runs into his childhood hero and current champion, Billy Rattle, during a smoke break. One of you is going to walk away from this conversation changed, but you're not quite sure who.

      - Smoking!
      - 3 Whole Endings!
      - Existential crises!
